text: Mme ka utlwa lentswe le tswa mo magodimong le re, “Kwala se: kwa bofelong lobaka lo fitlhile lwa gore baswela-tumelo ba tsene mo tuelong ya bone e e tletseng. Ee, go bua Mowa wa re, ba sego thata, gonne jaanong ba tlaa ikhutsa mo matsapeng a bone le diteko, gonne ditiro tsa bone tse di molemo di ba sala morago go ya legodimong!”
